sentences.en: Fools amends for sin, but goodwill is found among the upright.
sentences.cn: 愚妄人犯罪, 以为戏耍.(或作赎愆祭愚弄愚妄人)正直人互相喜悦.

sentences.en: He made amends for his rude remarks by giving her some flowers.
sentences.cn: 他赠她一些鲜花,以此对自己出言不逊表示歉意.

sentences.en: He made amends for his rudeness by giving her some flowers.
sentences.cn: 他送给她一些花,为他自己的鲁莽赔罪.

sentences.en: He repented of his wrongdoing and tried to make amends.
sentences.cn: 他悔自己的错误行为,而且尽力改正.

sentences.en: He soon made amends, however, by heading home a 29 th minute leveller.
sentences.cn: 不过他迅速淡定了下来, 在29分钟时以一记头槌扳平比分.

sentences.en: He wanted to make amends for causing their marriage to fail.
sentences.cn: 他导致了他们的婚姻破裂，因此想作出补偿。

sentences.en: Her little bravado made her feel as if she ought to make amends.
sentences.cn: 她这样闹了一下之后,觉得自己似乎应该作些补偿.

sentences.en: How can I ever make amends for ruining their party?
sentences.cn: 我把他们的聚会弄砸了,这个罪可怎么赔得起呀?

sentences.en: I do not know how you will ever make him amends for his kindness.
sentences.cn: 我不知道你怎样方能报答他的恩典.

sentences.en: It made him wish to make amends for his former unkindness to the boy.
sentences.cn: 这使他愿意为他过去对这孩子的不好而作补偿.

sentences.en: Shame goaded him into action to make amends.
sentences.cn: 惭愧令人动作,好补补自己的过错.

sentences.en: She is trying to make amends for her marriage not being sanctified.
sentences.cn: 她正努力弥补自己那段未受牧师认可的婚姻。

sentences.en: This country refuses stubbornly to make amends for its past war crimes.
sentences.cn: 该国顽固地拒绝为其过去的战争罪行赔罪.

sentences.en: You'd better go and make amends to him. I'm sure he'll forgive you.
sentences.cn: 你最好是负荆请罪, 我相信他会原谅你.

phrases.tran_cn: (律)（就诽谤行为）公开赔礼道歉的提议

trans.tran_en: recompense or compensation given or gained for some injury, insult, etc

trans.tran_cn: 改良，修改，修订( amend的第三人称单数 )
